content.question: Which of the following is the most likely explanation for Maesâ€™s choice of subject matter?

choices.label: He wished to emulate the classically influenced works of Italian Renaissance artists.
He wanted to condemn the increasingly materialist outlook of Dutch society.
He wanted to attract the patronage of the growing Dutch urban merchant class.
He wanted to demonstrate that wealth and property were a sign of divine favor.

content.answer: He wanted to attract the patronage of the growing Dutch urban merchant class.

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Explain the point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience of a source.
